channel.title: Strategy – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Merge Gun: Fps Shooting Zombie
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Merge Gun: Fps Shooting Zombie is a strategy defense game. Your main mission is to shoot down all coming undead creatures before they kill you. Before you join the battle, you can buy more guns and merge the same guns into new advanced ones.On PC and MobileTap and drag on the home page = move […]
item.content:encoded:
Merge Gun: Fps Shooting Zombie is a strategy defense game. Your main mission is to shoot down all coming undead creatures before they kill you. Before you join the battle, you can buy more guns and merge the same guns into new advanced ones.
On PC and MobileTap and drag on the home page = move the guns and mergeHold and swipe = aim with the crosshairClick = fire

item.title: Mahjong Sort Puzzle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mahjong Sort Puzzle is a brain online game. You sort out the mahjong, sort out the mahjong with the same color into a grid and they will all be eliminated.On PCClick or tap to play.On MobileTap to play.
item.content:encoded:
Mahjong Sort Puzzle is a brain online game. You sort out the mahjong, sort out the mahjong with the same color into a grid and they will all be eliminated.
On PCClick or tap to play.On MobileTap to play.

item.title: Honor Of Kings Online
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: King of Kings Online is an exciting tower defense strategy PVP game. You will be transformed into a hero. Your ultimate goal is cooperating with your team and attacking the local energy towers while preventing your side’s energy towers from being stolen! The first team to capture an energy tower wins.PCMouse click and drag to […]
item.content:encoded:
King of Kings Online is an exciting tower defense strategy PVP game. You will be transformed into a hero. Your ultimate goal is cooperating with your team and attacking the local energy towers while preventing your side’s energy towers from being stolen! The first team to capture an energy tower wins.
PCMouse click and drag to move, and click the button to attackMobileTap and slide to move,Â  and tap the button to attack

item.title: Archery Bastions: Castle War
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Archery Bastions: Castle War is a team arrow launch puzzle strategy game. Your target is to eliminate all enemy archers before they eliminate yours. Be aware of the enemy melee troops, they will crash your tower if you can’t shoot them down before they get close to your castle.On PC and MobileTap and hold = […]
item.content:encoded:
Archery Bastions: Castle War is a team arrow launch puzzle strategy game. Your target is to eliminate all enemy archers before they eliminate yours. Be aware of the enemy melee troops, they will crash your tower if you can’t shoot them down before they get close to your castle.
On PC and MobileTap and hold = aimRelease the finger = fire

item.title: Plants Vs Zombies War
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Easy to operate the plants with one button you can check the skills of each plant in the Almanac15 plants to use the kinds of zombies you will meet plants will attack automatically. Come and challenge the classic Plants vs. Zombies.On PC and MobileClick or tap = select plantsDrag = move plants
item.content:encoded:
Easy to operate the plants with one button you can check the skills of each plant in the Almanac15 plants to use the kinds of zombies you will meet plants will attack automatically. Come and challenge the classic Plants vs. Zombies.
On PC and MobileClick or tap = select plantsDrag = move plants

item.title: Crowd Defense
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Crowd Defense is a tower defense puzzle game. With a heavy machine gun and a cannon, you need to eliminate all incoming enemy units before they get close to your castle. Your weapon has limited ammo and reloading speed.On PC and MobileHold and drag = aim with auto fire
item.content:encoded:
Crowd Defense is a tower defense puzzle game. With a heavy machine gun and a cannon, you need to eliminate all incoming enemy units before they get close to your castle. Your weapon has limited ammo and reloading speed.
On PC and MobileHold and drag = aim with auto fire

item.title: Tower Boom
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Tower Boom is a relaxing online game. Your goal is to destroy all towers by placing explosives. Pick up dynamite and place it on the concrete. Then tap the detonate button to blow up all the explosives. On PCClick or tap on the screen.On MobileClick or tap on the screen.
item.content:encoded:
Tower Boom is a relaxing online game. Your goal is to destroy all towers by placing explosives. Pick up dynamite and place it on the concrete. Then tap the detonate button to blow up all the explosives.
On PCClick or tap on the screen.On MobileClick or tap on the screen.
